mapper.insert: insert into db_mysql (SEQUENCEID, DBHOST, DBNAME, DBUSERNAME, DBPASSWORD, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5) values (#{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dbhost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dbname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dbusername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dbpassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve5,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update db_mysql set DBHOST = #{dbhost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DBNAME = #{dbname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DBUSERNAME = #{dbusername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DBPASSWORD = #{dbpassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE1 = #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE2 = #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE3 = #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE4 = #{reserve4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE5 = #{reserve5,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, DBHOST, DBNAME, DBUSERNAME, DBPASSWORD, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5 from db_mysql where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select SEQUENCEID, DBHOST, DBNAME, DBUSERNAME, DBPASSWORD, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5 from db_mysql
